# Compiled class files
*.class

# IDE-specific files
.idea/
.vscode/
*.iml

# Build directories
target/
bin/

# Logs and temp files
*.log
*.tmp

# Configuration files
application.properties

# User-specific files
.classpath
.project

# Dependency directories
lib/

# Generated files
generated/

# OS-specific files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
